content.question: Which of the following is a likely response by another branch of government to a controversial decision such as Engel v. Vitale (1962) which declared that school-sponsored prayer was a violation of the First Amendment?

choices.label: The House of Representatives can impeach members of the Supreme Court in response to the decision.
The president can propose a constitutional amendment that will be ratified by the Senate.
Congress could strip the Supreme Court of appellate jurisdiction on cases dealing with prayer in school.
The Senate could refuse to confirm future federal court appointees until the case is overturned.

content.answer: Congress could strip the Supreme Court of appellate jurisdiction on cases dealing with prayer in school.
